name: 시스루 댄디컷
description: 이마를 살짝 가리면서도 답답하지 않게 연출하는 스타일. 부드럽고 훈훈한 인상을 주며, 긴 얼굴형 보완에 탁월합니다.
prompt_modifier: Korean see-through dandy cut hairstyle, soft texture, covering forehead lightly, neat sides, dark brown natural hair color, photorealistic, 8k

name: 드롭컷
description: 아이비리그컷과 크롭컷의 장점을 합친 스타일. 양옆은 누르고 앞머리 가운데를 살짝 떨어뜨려 M자 이마 보완과 동시에 샤프한 이미지를 줍니다.
prompt_modifier: Drop cut hairstyle, short textured fringe dropping down, high skin fade on sides, masculine and sharp look, black hair, photorealistic

name: 리프컷
description: 나뭇잎이 흐르는 듯한 실루엣의 긴 머리 스타일. 광대와 턱선을 부드럽게 감싸주어 각진 얼굴형을 보완하고 분위기 있는 연출이 가능합니다.
prompt_modifier: Leaf cut hairstyle, 5:5 parting, hair flowing naturally to the sides like a leaf shape, volume on top, soft perm texture, dark brown

name: 가일컷
description: 한쪽은 시원하게 넘기고 한쪽은 자연스럽게 내리는 하이브리드 스타일. 정장과 캐주얼 모두 잘 어울리며 남성적인 매력을 강조합니다.
prompt_modifier: Guile cut hairstyle, one side swept back, one side comma bang dropping, wet styling product finish, sharp jawline accent, black hair

name: 쉐도우펌
description: S컬 웨이브가 그림자처럼 흐르는 펌 스타일. 전체적인 볼륨감을 주어 얼굴이 작아 보이고, 멍뭉미 넘치는 귀여운 이미지를 연출합니다.
prompt_modifier: Shadow perm hairstyle, messy s-curl texture, voluminous top, covering forehead, cozy and casual look, warm brown hair

name: 허쉬컷
description: 층을 많이 내어 가볍고 힙한 느낌을 주는 중단발 스타일. 목선이 감싸지면서 턱선이 갸름해 보이는 효과가 있어 둥근 얼굴형에 강력 추천합니다.
prompt_modifier: Hush cut hairstyle, medium length, high layers, airy texture, hugging the neck, see-through bangs, ash brown color, chic mood

name: 빌드펌
description: C컬과 S컬을 믹스하여 자연스럽게 쌓아 올린 듯한 펌. 가장 호불호 없는 여신 머리로, 옆광대를 커버하고 우아한 분위기를 자아냅니다.
prompt_modifier: Build perm hairstyle, medium-long length, c-curl ends, side bangs flowing back, feminine and elegant, chocolate brown hair

name: 히피펌
description: 뿌리부터 뽀글뽀글한 컬이 들어간 레트로 스타일. 개성 있고 자유분방한 느낌을 주며, 시선을 분산시켜 각진 얼굴형을 부드럽게 만듭니다.
prompt_modifier: Hippie perm hairstyle, long hair, tight curls from roots to tips, bohemian vintage look, volume, fuzzy texture, dark brown

name: 슬릭번 (로우번)
description: 잔머리 없이 깔끔하게 빗어 넘겨 낮게 묶은 스타일. 두상이 예뻐 보이고 세련된 도시적인 이미지를 줍니다. 일명 '까치머리' 디테일이 포인트.
prompt_modifier: Sleek bun hairstyle, tightly tied low bun, distinct parting, glossy finish, modern and chic, small side hairs (sessam hairs), black hair

name: 태슬컷
description: 끝 처리가 가벼운 일자 단발 스타일. 도회적이고 시크한 매력이 있으며, 목선이 길어 보이고 이목구비가 뚜렷해 보입니다.
prompt_modifier: Tassel cut hairstyle, short straight bob, razor cut ends, no volume on sides, sleek and urban, platinum blonde or black hair

name: 시스루 애즈 펌 (2025 Trend)
prompt_modifier: Korean See-through As Perm. A sophisticated mix of As Perm and See-through bangs. The forehead is slightly exposed (5:5 or 6:4 parting). The bangs are light and airy, not heavy. Soft, natural waves. Romantic K-drama lead actor style.
negative_prompt_modifier: heavy bangs, stiff hair, greasy, tight curls

name: 필러스 컷 (Pillers Cut)
prompt_modifier: Korean Pillers Cut. A trendy high-volume style with a rectangular silhouette. The sides are slim (drop cut style), and the top has texture and volume. A mix of Ivy League and Flat Cut but more stylish and urban. Masculine but sophisticated.
negative_prompt_modifier: round silhouette, flat top, military cut

name: 슬릭 댄디 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Slick Dandy Cut. A modern dandy cut with a straightened, sleek texture. Minimal volume, very clean and sharp lines. The bangs fall straight down or slightly to the side. Chic, cold, and urban vibe.

name: 세미 리프 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Semi Leaf Cut. A shorter, cleaner version of the Leaf Cut. Hair flows backwards naturally like a leaf. It covers the tops of the ears slightly. Texturized and airy. Natural K-pop idol vibe.
negative_prompt_modifier: short hair, military style, heavy mullet

name: 스핀스왈로 펌 (소프트)
prompt_modifier: Korean Soft Spin Swallow Perm. It has a rough, spiky texture but is NOT too curly or afro-like. The curls are random and loose, creating a 'swaggy' and messy-chic look. Volume is airy, not frizzy. Trendy street style.
negative_prompt_modifier: afro, tight curls, broccoli hair, messy explosion

name: 가일 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Guile Cut. One side is a natural comma bang, the other is tucked behind the ear. Sharp and masculine. The texture is clean and semi-matte, not overly greasy pomade style. Park Seo-joon style.

name: 시스루 댄디 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean See-through Dandy Cut. The most popular daily hairstyle in Korea. Soft bangs that lightly cover the forehead. Very natural and innocent look. Not too heavy.
negative_prompt_modifier: heavy bowl cut, helmet hair, spiky

name: 쉐도우 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean Shadow Perm. S-curl waves that create shadow-like volume on top. The curls are soft and round, not tight. Cute and energetic younger brother vibe.

name: 아이비리그 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Ivy League Cut. Short sides, flat top, and front hair lifted naturally. It looks sporty and neat, not like a harsh military crew cut. Modern and smart.

name: 드롭 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Drop Cut. Similar to Ivy League but the side bangs drop down to cover the M-line of the forehead. Sharp, trendy, and face-slimming effect.

name: 애즈 펌 (클래식)
prompt_modifier: Korean Classic As Perm. Natural center parting where the bangs curl inward like parentheses (). Very soft and romantic standard Korean style.

name: 히피 펌 (남성 장발)
prompt_modifier: Korean Men's Hippie Perm. For medium-long hair. Uniform, boho-chic waves. Artistic and free-spirited vibe. Not too tight, just bouncy volume.

name: 포마드 컷 (한국식 바버)
prompt_modifier: Korean Barber Style Pomade Cut. Ideally neat side part. However, unlike Western pomade, it has some volume and softness. Gentleman look. Not too oily/greasy.

name: 울프 컷 (소프트)
prompt_modifier: Korean Soft Wolf Cut / Mullet. Long tail at the back, but the overall silhouette is not too extreme. Layers are textured but connected. Hip and trendy.

name: 가르마 펌 (6:4)
prompt_modifier: Korean Parted Perm (Garma Perm). 6:4 ratio. The front hair roots have volume (Root Perm). Flows naturally to the side. Intellectual look.

name: 플랫 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Flat Cut. Top of head is flat, sides are slim. Very structural and chic. Modern modification of the crew cut.

name: 맨 번 (예술가 스타일)
prompt_modifier: Korean Man Bun. Long hair tied up loosely and naturally. Not too tight. Small strands of hair (side bangs) falling naturally for a vibe. Artistic.

name: 버즈 컷 (패션)
prompt_modifier: Korean Fashion Buzz Cut. Very short, but the hairline is perfectly lined up. Often paired with scratch details or dyed hair. Street fashion style.

name: 슬릭 백 (장발)
prompt_modifier: Korean Long Slick Back. Long hair brushed back cleanly but with some airy volume. Not plastered to the head. Mature and sexy vibe.

name: 리젠트 컷 (소프트)
prompt_modifier: Korean Soft Regent Cut. Forehead exposed, bangs raised. A standard short haircut for business men. Clean and trustworthy.

name: 레이어드 컷 (허쉬 스타일)
prompt_modifier: Korean Layered Cut (Hush Style). Medium-long hair with distinct, lightweight layers. Face-framing side bangs. The ends look feathery and soft. Natural K-beauty style.

name: 슬릭 컷 (뉴진스 스타일)
prompt_modifier: Korean Sleek Cut / Slick Perm. Long, straight hair with no layers. Very shiny and healthy texture. Y2K innocent vibe. NewJeans style.

name: 빌드 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean Build Perm. Medium length. S-curls on the side to build volume and C-curls at the ends. Feminine, elegant, and standard goddess hair.

name: 태슬 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Tassel Cut. Short bob with straight, blunt ends (like a tassel). Slight outward flip at the very tips. Chic and modern city woman.

name: 히피 펌 (젤리 펌)
prompt_modifier: Korean Hippie / Jelly Perm. Long hair with uniform, bouncy waves from root to tip. Cute, retro, and lovely. Volume is key but the curls are defined, not frizzy.

name: 허쉬 컷 (중단발)
prompt_modifier: Korean Hush Cut (Medium). Shoulder length with high layers. Neck area is light/thin, top is voluminous. Cool, chic, and boyish-feminine mix.

name: 윈드 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Wind Cut. Short/Medium layered cut. Looks like wind is blowing through it. Airy texture. Very natural and daily style.

name: CS컬 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean CS Curl Perm. A mix of C-curls and S-curls. Dynamic and elegant. Most standard Korean wave permutation.

name: 물결 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean Water Wave Perm. Distinct horizontal S-waves (Ripples). Very uniform and classic 'mermaid' hair look.

name: 보니 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean Bonnie Perm. Classic C-curl bob. Rounded silhouette. Youthful, cute, and student-like vibe.

name: 중단발 레이어드
prompt_modifier: Korean Medium Layered Cut. Shoulder length or slightly below. Soft layers. Ends flip naturally (C-curl). Daily, easy-going look.

name: 사이드 뱅 (여신머리)
description: Long hair with signature Korean Side Bangs.
prompt_modifier: Long hair with signature Korean Side Bangs. Bangs flow along the cheekbones to correct face shape. Elegant and feminine.

name: 처피 뱅
prompt_modifier: Korean Choppy Bangs. Eyebrow-revealing short bangs with uneven texture. Cute and kitsch. Paired with long or short hair.

name: 모즈 펌
prompt_modifier: Korean Mods Perm. Short bob with C-curls creating a clean, slightly outward silhouette. Classic and lovely.

name: 샌드 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Sand Cut. A layered cut with sandy, scattering texture. Very light ends. Mood-focused style.

name: 페이지 컷
prompt_modifier: Korean Page Cut. A clean, round, helmet-like (but stylish) bob. Minimal layers. Focus on the head shape.

name: 발레아쥬 (애쉬)
prompt_modifier: Korean Ash Balayage. Subtle highlights. Not too high contrast. Soft, milky colors preferred over strong western gold.

name: 옴브레 (소프트)
prompt_modifier: Korean Soft Ombre. Gradual fade. Colors are usually ash brown, ash gray, or pink. Natural gradient.

name: 단발 C컬 (기본)
prompt_modifier: Standard Korean C-curl Bob. Chin length. Ends curl inward. Innocent and neat.

name: 구름 펌 (굵은 히피)
prompt_modifier: Korean Cloud Perm. Similar to Hippie perm but the curls are much larger and looser, like clouds. Soft and fluffy volume. Romantic.
